content.rendered:
Our Services

At Stallion Cruise we operate daily coaches moving to and from four major destinations namely Harare, Bulawayo, Victoria Falls and Johannesburg. These coaches make stops en route in Kadoma, Kwekwe, Gweru, Zvishavane, Masvingo and Mussina.

Our services are however not entirely limited to schedule inter-city routes as we also offer coach hiring services as well as personalised tour packages and private hires to suit the needs of our different clients.
